description.zh-cn: 位于东南欧巴尔干半岛上的一个国家。1990年，在东欧剧变影响下，保加利亚人民共和国改组为保加利亚共和国，并过渡到议会民主制。于2004年加入北约，2007年加入欧盟。
description.en: A country located on the Balkan Peninsula in Southeast Europe. In 1990, influenced by the revolutions in Eastern Europe, the People's Republic of Bulgaria was reformed into the Republic of Bulgaria and transitioned to a parliamentary democracy. It joined NATO in 2004 and the European Union in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚政治人物，保加利亚共和国现任总统。
description.en: Bulgarian politician, the current President of the Republic of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚政治人物，曾任保加利亚总理。
description.en: Bulgarian politician, former Prime Minister of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲的政治和经济联盟。保加利亚于2007年1月1日加入。
description.en: A political and economic union in Europe. Bulgaria joined on January 1, 2007.

description.zh-cn: 由阿斯帕鲁克汗于681年建立的中世纪保加利亚国家，后于1018年被拜占庭帝国征服。
description.en: A medieval Bulgarian state founded in 681 by Khan Asparuh, which was conquered by the Byzantine Empire in 1018.

description.zh-cn: 保加尔人首领，击败拜占庭皇帝查士丁尼二世后，于680年建立了保加利亚第一帝国。
description.en: A Bulgar leader who founded the First Bulgarian Empire in 680 after defeating the Byzantine Emperor Justinian II.

description.zh-cn: 中世纪的罗马帝国，在保加利亚历史中扮演了重要角色，曾是其长期的对手和征服者。
description.en: The Roman Empire during the Middle Ages, which played a significant role in Bulgarian history as a long-time rival and conqueror.

description.zh-cn: 拜占庭皇帝，被阿斯帕鲁克汗击败，后者随后建立了保加利亚第一帝国。
description.en: Byzantine Emperor defeated by Khan Asparuh, who then established the First Bulgarian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚第一帝国的统治者，引入了成文法典，并在普利斯卡战役中击败了拜占庭军队。
description.en: Ruler of the First Bulgarian Empire who introduced a written code of law and defeated the Byzantine army at the Battle of Pliska.

description.zh-cn: 拜占庭皇帝，在普利斯卡战役中被克鲁姆领导的保加利亚军队所杀。
description.en: Byzantine Emperor who was killed in the Battle of Pliska by the Bulgarian army led by Krum.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚第一帝国的统治者，于864年皈依基督教并采用西里尔字母。
description.en: Ruler of the First Bulgarian Empire who converted to Christianity in 864 and adopted the Cyrillic alphabet.

description.zh-cn: 拜占庭皇帝，在克柳赫战役中击败保加利亚军队，并最终于1018年征服了保加利亚第一帝国。
description.en: Byzantine Emperor who defeated the Bulgarian army at the Battle of Kleidion and ultimately conquered the First Bulgarian Empire in 1018.

description.zh-cn: 由彼得四世和伊凡·阿森一世兄弟领导起义后建立的中世纪保加利亚国家，后被奥斯曼帝国征服。
description.en: A medieval Bulgarian state established after an uprising led by brothers Peter IV and Ivan Asen I, later conquered by the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚沙皇，于1185年与兄弟伊凡·阿森一世共同领导起义，建立了保加利亚第二帝国。
description.en: Tsar of Bulgaria who, along with his brother Ivan Asen I, led an uprising in 1185 to establish the Second Bulgarian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚沙皇，于1185年与兄弟彼得四世共同领导起义，建立了保加利亚第二帝国。
description.en: Tsar of Bulgaria who, along with his brother Peter II, led an uprising in 1185 to establish the Second Bulgarian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 一个曾控制东南欧大片地区的帝国，于14世纪末征服保加利亚并统治了近五个世纪。
description.en: An empire that controlled large areas of Southeast Europe, conquering Bulgaria in the late 14th century and ruling for nearly five centuries.

description.zh-cn: 在1877-1878年的俄土战争中击败奥斯曼帝国，对保加利亚的解放起到了关键作用。
description.en: Played a key role in the liberation of Bulgaria by defeating the Ottoman Empire in the Russo-Turkish War of 1877-1878.

description.zh-cn: 根据《柏林条约》成立的奥斯曼帝国下属的自治实体，于1908年宣布完全独立并升格为王国。
description.en: An autonomous entity under the Ottoman Empire established by the Treaty of Berlin, which declared full independence and was elevated to a kingdom in 1908.

description.zh-cn: 1878年签署的国际条约，正式承认保加利亚亲王国的自治地位。
description.en: An international treaty signed in 1878 that officially recognized the autonomous status of the Principality of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 1908年由保加利亚亲王国升格而成的独立国家。参与了巴尔干战争、第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战，最终于1946年被废除君主制。
description.en: An independent state established in 1908, elevated from the Principality of Bulgaria. It participated in the Balkan Wars, World War I, and World War II, and the monarchy was abolished in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚、塞尔维亚、黑山、希腊组成的巴尔干同盟对奥斯曼帝国发动的战争。
description.en: A war waged by the Balkan League (Bulgaria, Serbia, Montenegro, Greece) against the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 因战利品分配问题，保加利亚对其前盟友塞尔维亚和希腊发动的战争，罗马尼亚和奥斯曼帝国也加入其中对抗保加利亚，导致保加利亚战败并丧失领土。
description.en: A war initiated by Bulgaria against its former allies Serbia and Greece over the division of spoils, which Romania and the Ottoman Empire also joined against Bulgaria, resulting in Bulgaria's defeat and loss of territory.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性战争，保加利亚于1915年加入同盟国集团参战，最终战败。
description.en: A global war in which Bulgaria participated on the side of the Central Powers, joining in 1915 and ultimately being defeated.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战中的军事联盟，主要成员包括德意志帝国、奥匈帝国、奥斯曼帝国和保加利亚王国。
description.en: A military alliance in World War I, primarily consisting of the German Empire, Austria-Hungary, the Ottoman Empire, and the Kingdom of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性战争，保加利亚于1941年加入轴心国，后于1944年倒戈盟军。
description.en: A global war in which Bulgaria joined the Axis powers in 1941, and later switched to the Allied side in 1944.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的军事联盟，主要成员包括纳粹德国、意大利王国和日本帝国。保加利亚于1941年加入。
description.en: A military alliance in World War II, primarily consisting of Nazi Germany, the Kingdom of Italy, and the Empire of Japan. Bulgaria joined in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中轴心国的核心成员，对保加利亚加入轴心国起到了决定性作用。
description.en: A core member of the Axis powers in World War II, which played a decisive role in Bulgaria joining the Axis.

description.zh-cn: 于1944年向保加利亚宣战，战后保加利亚被划入其势力范围，成为东方集团的一员。
description.en: Declared war on Bulgaria in 1944. After the war, Bulgaria fell into its sphere of influence, becoming a member of the Eastern Bloc.

description.zh-cn: 在苏联军队进入保加利亚后，由祖国阵线发动的政变，推翻了王国政府，为成立人民共和国铺平了道路。
description.en: A coup launched by the Fatherland Front after Soviet troops entered Bulgaria, which overthrew the kingdom's government and paved the way for the establishment of a people's republic.

description.zh-cn: 二战后建立的社会主义国家，是华沙条约组织的成员和苏联的盟友，于1990年解体。
description.en: A socialist state established after World War II, a member of the Warsaw Pact and an ally of the Soviet Union, which was dissolved in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚人民共和国首任领导人。
description.en: The first leader of the People's Republic of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 由苏联领导的东方集团国家的军事联盟，保加利亚人民共和国于1955年加入。
description.en: A military alliance of Eastern Bloc countries led by the Soviet Union, which the People's Republic of Bulgaria joined in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 东欧的一系列革命，导致了该地区共产主义政权的垮台，包括保加利亚。
description.en: A series of revolutions in Eastern Europe that resulted in the collapse of communist regimes in the region, including in Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 北大西洋公约组织的简称，是一个军事联盟。保加利亚于2004年加入。
description.en: Abbreviation for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, a military alliance. Bulgaria joined in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 阿斯帕鲁克汗击败拜占庭后，建立了保加利亚第一帝国。
description.en: After defeating the Byzantines, Khan Asparuh founded the First Bulgarian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 680年，阿斯帕鲁克汗击败拜占庭皇帝查士丁尼二世，与之立约，正式获得多瑙河以南地区。
description.en: In 680, Khan Asparuh defeated the Byzantine Emperor Justinian II and made a treaty with him, formally acquiring the region south of the Danube.

description.zh-cn: 在普利斯卡战役中，克鲁姆领导的军队击败了拜占庭入侵，并杀死了拜占庭皇帝尼斯弗鲁斯一世。
description.en: During the Battle of Pliska, troops led by Krum defeated a Byzantine invasion and killed Emperor Nikephoros I.

description.zh-cn: 拜占庭皇帝巴西尔二世在克柳赫击败保加利亚军队，并最终在1018年完全征服了保加利亚第一帝国。
description.en: The Byzantine Emperor Basil II defeated the Bulgarian army at Kleidion and eventually completed the conquest of the First Bulgarian Empire in 1018.

description.zh-cn: 彼得四世与兄弟伊凡·阿森一世领导保加利亚人起义，建立了保加利亚第二帝国。
description.en: Peter IV and his brother Ivan Asen I led a Bulgarian uprising and founded the Second Bulgarian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 伊凡·阿森一世与兄弟彼得四世领导保加利亚人起义，建立了保加利亚第二帝国。
description.en: Ivan Asen I and his brother Peter IV led a Bulgarian uprising and founded the Second Bulgarian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 奥斯曼帝国于1393年完成了对大部分保加利亚土地的征服，最终导致第二帝国于1396年灭亡。
description.en: The Ottoman Empire completed its conquest of most Bulgarian lands by 1393, leading to the fall of the Second Empire in 1396.

description.zh-cn: 《柏林条约》的签署使得保加利亚获得了自治地位，成立了半独立的保加利亚亲王国。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Berlin granted Bulgaria autonomous status, establishing the semi-independent Principality of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 在1877-1878年俄土战争后，俄罗斯等列强的支持促成了保加利亚亲王国的建立。
description.en: After the Russo-Turkish War of 1877-1878, support from Russia and other great powers led to the establishment of the Principality of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次巴尔干战争中，保加利亚王国作为巴尔干同盟的一员与奥斯曼帝国作战。
description.en: In the First Balkan War, the Kingdom of Bulgaria, as a member of the Balkan League, fought against the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 第二次巴尔干战争导致保加利亚战败，不仅失去了不少战利品，还将南多布罗加割给了罗马尼亚。
description.en: The Second Balkan War resulted in Bulgaria's defeat, causing it to lose not only many of its spoils of war but also to cede Southern Dobruja to Romania.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚王国于1915年加入同盟国集团，参与第一次世界大战。
description.en: The Kingdom of Bulgaria joined the Central Powers in 1915 to participate in World War I.

description.zh-cn: 作为战败国，保加利亚在第一次世界大战后失去了其在爱琴海的海岸线，军队也被解散。
description.en: As a defeated nation after World War I, Bulgaria lost its coastline on the Aegean Sea and its army was disbanded.

description.zh-cn: 1941年3月1日，保加利亚签署《三国同盟条约》，正式加入轴心国。1944年9月对德宣战，倒戈盟军。
description.en: On March 1, 1941, Bulgaria signed the Tripartite Pact, officially joining the Axis powers. It declared war on Germany in September 1944, switching to the Allied side.

description.zh-cn: 1944年9月5日，苏联向保加利亚宣战，加速了王国政府的垮台。
description.en: On September 5, 1944, the Soviet Union declared war on Bulgaria, accelerating the collapse of the kingdom's government.

description.zh-cn: 1944年9月9日的政变推翻了保加利亚王室，结束了保加利亚王国的统治。
description.en: The coup d'état on September 9, 1944, overthrew the Bulgarian royal family, ending the rule of the Kingdom of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 政变后共产党掌握了政权，为1946年成立保加利亚人民共和国铺平了道路。
description.en: After the coup, the Communist Party seized power, paving the way for the establishment of the People's Republic of Bulgaria in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 格奥尔基·季米特洛夫成为保加利亚人民共和国的首任领导人。
description.en: Georgi Dimitrov became the first leader of the People's Republic of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，保加利亚人民共和国被划入苏联的势力圈，成为其在东欧的重要盟友。
description.en: After World War II, the People's Republic of Bulgaria was drawn into the Soviet sphere of influence, becoming a key ally in Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚于1955年成为华沙条约组织的成员。
description.en: Bulgaria became a member of the Warsaw Pact in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年民主运动的影响下，保加利亚的共产党政府于1989年11月10日垮台。
description.en: Under the influence of the Revolutions of 1989, the communist government of Bulgaria collapsed on November 10, 1989.

description.zh-cn: 1989年的民主运动促使保加利亚人民共和国解体，并向议会民主制的保加利亚共和国过渡。
description.en: The democratic movement of 1989 led to the dissolution of the People's Republic of Bulgaria and the transition to the parliamentary democracy of the Republic of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 鲁门·拉德夫是保加利亚共和国的总统。
description.en: Rumen Radev is the President of the Republic of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，罗森·热利亚兹科夫是保加利亚共和国的总理。
description.en: According to the text, Rosen Zhelyazkov is the Prime Minister of the Republic of Bulgaria.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚于2004年3月29日成为北约成员国。
description.en: Bulgaria became a member of NATO on March 29, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚于2007年1月1日成为欧盟成员国。
description.en: Bulgaria became a member of the European Union on January 1, 2007.
